attributes.action: Hostile acts on Gibraltar by Spain is an act of aggression and will be repelled.
attributes.background: Spain has stepped up hostilities in recent months by ramming boats, shooting at fishermen repeated harassment stopping them from working. Spain must stop her acts of aggression and not enter British waters or airspace.

rejection.details:
This petition has been rejected because it is not clear what action you would like the UK Government and/or Parliament to take in response to the actions taken by the Spanish government. 

You may wish to consider resubmitting this petition with a statement outlining what action you would like taken.
